title: DataFlowNode
description: A service's participation in a domain's data flow, with optional service-specific alias

id.description: Service name (must match a Service.name from services.json)

modifies.description: Whether this service modifies the domain data

aliases.description: Optional array of service-specific names for the domain. If omitted, the service uses the canonical domain name. If present, these are what the service calls the domain internally.
